instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-2879- Always green light and battery not charging.
threads.message:
820-2879- Alway green light and battery not charging.
 It works fine except battery is not charging , On os it shows batter, change original battery  no luck.

R5280=2.61k
R5281=2.61k

R7051=2.2
R7052=0
R7050=0.01

R7020=0.02
R7021=10k
R7022=10k
Any help please.

threads.title: 820-2879- Always green light and battery not charging.
threads.message:
"R7021=10k
R7022=10k"
19K for sure???
What schematic says?

Did you try disconnecting BIL?
Exact PPBUS_G3H voltage?
Also post diode mode to ground at SCL/SDA lines of battery bus.

threads.title: 820-2879- Always green light and battery not charging.
threads.message: Used original battery was faulty.  Change the battery indicator and new original battery , fix the problem. Thanks.
